languages.text: "Ты явился, безмозглый щенок". {n}От одного звука голоса Назракея у вас начинает саднить в голове — там, где когда-то свернулась личинка-мозгоед.{/n} "Караэль не врал, заявляя, что тебе хватит глупости — или наглости — вновь показать свое лицо перед Опустошительной бурей... точнее, новыми рядами Черного сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Ты явился, безмозглый щенок. Все еще испытываешь глупую надежду вернуть себе преданность тех, кого ты обесчестил на глазах всего Темного города? Караэль не врал, заявляя, что тебе хватит наглости вновь показать свое лицо перед Опустошительной бурей... точнее, новыми рядами Черного сердца".
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."
languages.original_text: "Ты явился, безмозглый щенок". {n}От одного звука голоса Назракея у вас начинает саднить в голове — там, где когда-то свернулась личинка-мозгоед.{/n} "Караэль не врал, заявляя, что тебе хватит глупости — или наглости — вновь показать свое лицо перед Опустошительной бурей... точнее, новыми рядами Черного сердца".

traits.locale_text: "So you did show up, you mindless whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where a brain-eating maggot once curled up.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be foolish enough, or brazen enough, to show your face before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, the new ranks of the Black Heart."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "So you did show up, you mindless whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where a brain-eating maggot once curled up.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be foolish enough, or brazen enough, to show your face before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, the new ranks of the Black Heart."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Ihr seid gekommen, Ihr törichter Wurm." {n}Der bloße Klang von Nazrakheis Stimme löst ein Jucken in deinem Kopf aus, wo einst die hirnfressende Made saß.{/n} "Kharael hat nicht gelogen, als er sagte Ihr wäret dumm genug oder kühn genug, Euch dem Plündernden Sturm wieder zu zeigen ... oder besser den neuen Mitgliedern des Schwarzen Herzens."
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid gekommen, Ihr törichter Wurm." {n}Der bloße Klang von Nazrakheis Stimme löst ein Jucken in deinem Kopf aus, wo einst die hirnfressende Made saß.{/n} "Kharael hat nicht gelogen, als er sagte Ihr wäret dumm genug oder kühn genug, Euch dem Plündernden Sturm wieder zu zeigen ... oder besser den neuen Mitgliedern des Schwarzen Herzens."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: “你真的来了，你这愚蠢的小崽子。”{n}纳札骸的声音让你感觉脑袋里有点发痒。曾几何时，有条食脑蛆虫就住在你的脑袋里。{/n}“看来卡瑞尔并没有说谎。他说你是个蠢货，也是个厚颜无耻的家伙，一定会再次出现在狂风阴谋团面前……或者更确切地说，是出现在黑心阴谋团新的成员面前。”
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: “你真的来了，你这愚蠢的小崽子。”{n}纳札骸的声音让你感觉脑袋里有点发痒。曾几何时，有条食脑蛆虫就住在你的脑袋里。{/n}“看来卡瑞尔并没有说谎。他说你是个蠢货，也是个厚颜无耻的家伙，一定会再次出现在狂风阴谋团面前……或者更确切地说，是出现在黑心阴谋团新的成员面前。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: « Vous êtes venu, avorton sans cervelle. » {n}Le simple son de la voix de Nazrakhei provoque des démangeaisons dans votre crâne, spécifiquement là où le ver cérébral était niché.{/n} « Kharael avait donc raison lorsqu'il assurait que vous seriez assez stupide, ou impudent, pour vous présenter devant la Tempête ravageuse à nouveau... ou plutôt, devant les nouveaux rangs du Cœur Noir. »
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes venu, avorton sans cervelle. » {n}Le simple son de la voix de Nazrakhei provoque des démangeaisons dans votre crâne, spécifiquement là où le ver cérébral était niché.{/n} « Kharael avait donc raison lorsqu'il assurait que vous seriez assez stupide, ou impudent, pour vous présenter devant la Tempête ravageuse à nouveau... ou plutôt, devant les nouveaux rangs du Cœur Noir. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: «Has venido, cachorro insensato». {n}El sonido de la voz de Nazrakhei te causa un picor en la cabeza, donde tuviste el gusano devorador de cerebros implantado.{/n} «Kharael no mentía cuando afirmó que serías lo bastante idiota o lo bastante osado como para volver a mostrarte ante la Tempestad Asoladora... o mejor dicho, ante los nuevos miembros del Corazón Negro».
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: «Has venido, cachorro insensato». {n}El sonido de la voz de Nazrakhei te causa un picor en la cabeza, donde tuviste el gusano devorador de cerebros implantado.{/n} «Kharael no mentía cuando afirmó que serías lo bastante idiota o lo bastante osado como para volver a mostrarte ante la Tempestad Asoladora... o mejor dicho, ante los nuevos miembros del Corazón Negro».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: 「来たか、愚かな若造よ」{n}ナズラクヘイの声に含まれる音は、かつて脳を食い物にするウジが頭に住み着いた時に感じたのと同じ、むずむずとした感覚を与えてくる。{/n}「カラエルは嘘をついていなかったようだ。お前は驚くほど愚かで図々しいから、再び略奪の嵐や…黒き心臓の新しい顔ぶれの前に姿を表すんじゃないかと言っていた」
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: 「来たか、愚かな若造よ」{n}ナズラクヘイの声に含まれる音は、かつて脳を食い物にするウジが頭に住み着いた時に感じたのと同じ、むずむずとした感覚を与えてくる。{/n}「カラエルは嘘をついていなかったようだ。お前は驚くほど愚かで図々しいから、再び略奪の嵐や…黒き心臓の新しい顔ぶれの前に姿を表すんじゃないかと言っていた」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Demek geldin sersem solucan." {n}Nazrakhei'in sadece sesini duymak bile beyin yiyen kurdun, kafanda eskiden bulunduğu yerin kaşınmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Kharael, Müfteris Kasırga'nın... Daha doğrusu Kara Yürek'in yeni askerlerinin önüne bir kez daha çıkacak kadar aptal veya yüzsüz olduğunu iddia ederken haksız değilmiş."
languages.original_text: "You came, you foolish whelp." {n}The mere sound of Nazrakhei's voice gives you an itchy feeling in your head where the brain-eating maggot was once nestled.{/n} "Kharael was not lying when he claimed you would be stupid enough, or brazen enough, to show yourself before the Reaving Tempest again... or rather, before the new ranks of the Black Heart."

traits.locale_text: "Gelmişsin seni sersem solucan." {n}Nazrakhei'in sadece sesi bile, beyin yiyen kurdun kafanda eskiden bulunduğu yerin kaşınmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Kharael, Müfteris Kasırga'nın önüne tekrar çıkacak kadar aptal veya yüzsüz olduğunu iddia ederken yalan söylemiyormuş. Daha doğrusu Kara Yürek'in yeni askerlerinin önüne."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
